name: Hillmer Chona
title: MedellinJUG Leader, Java Champion & Oracle GroundBreaker Ambassador
bio: Hillmer is a System Engineer, Java Champion, Oracle GroundBreaker Ambassador, Medellin JUG Leader, Organizer of the Hispanic Community of JUGs, Dukeâ€™s Choice Award Winner, Open Source Contributor in project such as Hibernate Validator and Eclipse Collections, and software architect focusing on Java Technologies. In his job he has been both project manager and software architect.
